items.summary: Remove the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” attribution block from the site footer and ensure the footer layout remains visually balanced after removal.

Improve the marketing site content so it feels more real, detailed, and impressive for an influencer marketing agency.

Update/extend the existing marketing sections to add more credibility-oriented content (keep all text in English), such as:
- A clearer services breakdown (for brands and for creators)
- A more detailed process/timeline (what happens after someone applies)
- Social proof placeholders (e.g., testimonial cards and/or “trusted by” logo placeholders) without claiming real brands or numbers
- An FAQ section addressing common questions for brands and creators

Do not remove the existing “How It Works”, “What We Offer”, or the application forms; enhance around them.

Update the footer “Get in Touch” area to include the same agency email and WhatsApp contact details (dkoda911@gmail.com, +1 626-875-4603) so users can contact Koda D without needing to fill the application forms.

Add a dedicated Contact section that is reachable from the site navigation and includes the agency email and WhatsApp number.

Include these exact contact details in the Contact section:
- Email: dkoda911@gmail.com
- WhatsApp: +1 626-875-4603

The Contact section must be accessible via a “Contact” option in the header navigation and must scroll to the Contact section when clicked (consistent with existing smooth-scroll behavior).
